languages.text: {n}Девушка заливается багрянцем и принимает из ваших рук напиток.{/n} "Благодарю вас, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Я пью за ваше вечное процветание, и чтобы Тассера всегда служила вам верой и истиной..." {n}Мейв пригубливает напиток, кашляет, но, заметив ваш взгляд, все же мужественно осушает кубок.{/n}

{n}The young woman's cheeks flush a bright red as she accepts the drink from you.{/n} "Thank you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка заливается багрянцем и принимает из ваших рук напиток.{/n} "Благодарю вас, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Я пью за ваше вечное процветание, и чтобы Тассера всегда служила вам верой и истиной..." {n}Мейв пригубливает напиток, кашляет, но, заметив ваш взгляд, все же мужественно осушает кубок.{/n}

Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}

languages.text: {n}年轻的姑娘从你手中接过了美酒，脸颊涨得通红。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人。祝您永远诸事遂心，塔瑟拉永远忠诚地侍奉您……”{n}梅芙喝了一小口酒，随后咳嗽起来，但注意到你的目光之后，她还是鼓起勇气，将酒一饮而尽。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's cheeks flush a bright red as she accepts the drink from you.{/n} "Thank you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻的姑娘从你手中接过了美酒，脸颊涨得通红。{/n}“谢谢您，来自上界的大人。祝您永远诸事遂心，塔瑟拉永远忠诚地侍奉您……”{n}梅芙喝了一小口酒，随后咳嗽起来，但注意到你的目光之后，她还是鼓起勇气，将酒一饮而尽。{/n}

languages.text: {n}若い女性は、あなたから酒を受け取ると頬を真っ赤に染めた。{/n}「ありがとうございます、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなた様に永遠の繁栄を。そしてタッセーラがこれからも変わらず忠実に、誠実にお仕えできますように…」{n}メイヴはひと口飲んでむせたが、あなたの視線に気づくと、覚悟を決めたように残りを一気に飲み干した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's cheeks flush a bright red as she accepts the drink from you.{/n} "Thank you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}若い女性は、あなたから酒を受け取ると頬を真っ赤に染めた。{/n}「ありがとうございます、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなた様に永遠の繁栄を。そしてタッセーラがこれからも変わらず忠実に、誠実にお仕えできますように…」{n}メイヴはひと口飲んでむせたが、あなたの視線に気づくと、覚悟を決めたように残りを一気に飲み干した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las mejillas de la muchacha enrojecen al aceptar la bebida que le ofreces.{/n} «Gracias, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Brindo por su prosperidad eterna y por que Thassera siempre le sirva con lealtad...». {n}Maive da un sorbo y tose, pero al percatarse de que la estás mirando decide apurar la copa de un trago.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's cheeks flush a bright red as she accepts the drink from you.{/n} "Thank you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mejillas de la muchacha enrojecen al aceptar la bebida que le ofreces.{/n} «Gracias, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Brindo por su prosperidad eterna y por que Thassera siempre le sirva con lealtad...». {n}Maive da un sorbo y tose, pero al percatarse de que la estás mirando decide apurar la copa de un trago.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İçkiyi kabul ettiği sırada genç kadının yanakları kıpkırmızı oluyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Sonsuza dek refah içinde yaşamanızın ve Thassera'nın size daima sadakatle hizmet etmesinin şerefine..." {n}Maive, bir yudum alıp öksürse de ona baktığını fark edince cesurca içkisini bitiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's cheeks flush a bright red as she accepts the drink from you.{/n} "Thank you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İçkiyi kabul ettiği sırada genç kadının yanakları kıpkırmızı oluyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Sonsuza dek refah içinde yaşamanızın ve Thassera'nın size daima sadakatle hizmet etmesinin şerefine..." {n}Maive, bir yudum alıp öksürse de ona baktığını fark edince cesurca içkisini bitiriyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La jeune femme rougit violemment en acceptant le verre que vous lui tendez.{/n} « Merci, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. À votre prospérité éternelle. Puisse Thassera vous servir humblement et loyalement pour toujours... » {n}Maive est prise d'une quinte de toux à la première gorgée, mais finit courageusement son verre sous votre regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's cheeks flush a bright red as she accepts the drink from you.{/n} "Thank you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La jeune femme rougit violemment en acceptant le verre que vous lui tendez.{/n} « Merci, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. À votre prospérité éternelle. Puisse Thassera vous servir humblement et loyalement pour toujours... » {n}Maive est prise d'une quinte de toux à la première gorgée, mais finit courageusement son verre sous votre regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Wangen der jungen Frau färben sich rot, als sie das Getränk von dir annimmt.{/n} "Danke, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Ich trinke darauf, dass Ihr stets erfolgreich seid und Thassera Euch stets aufrichtig dienen möge ..." {n}Maive trinkt einen Schluck und hustet, stürzt das Getränk aber in einem Zug hinunter, als sie deinen Blick bemerkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman's cheeks flush a bright red as she accepts the drink from you.{/n} "Thank you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Here's to you prospering forever, and Thassera always serving you truly and faithfully..." {n}Maive takes a sip and coughs, but upon noticing your gaze, she bravely downs the drink after all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wangen der jungen Frau färben sich rot, als sie das Getränk von dir annimmt.{/n} "Danke, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Ich trinke darauf, dass Ihr stets erfolgreich seid und Thassera Euch stets aufrichtig dienen möge ..." {n}Maive trinkt einen Schluck und hustet, stürzt das Getränk aber in einem Zug hinunter, als sie deinen Blick bemerkt.
